attributes.action: National Lottery scratchcards - the odds on which you can win a prize greater than what you have staked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: scratchcard information gives you the overall odds of winning a prize, usually about 1 in 4.7, what people need to know is the odds on which you've staked i.e. £2 and the chance of winning a greater amount than staked

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
